TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SocketPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class SocketPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class SocketPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type SocketPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制在传输地址上建立或接受连接的权利。

span.span: Controls rights to make or accept connections on a transport address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的 control 权限，以接受连接或启动连接。 instances control permission to accept connections or initiate connections. 一个可以为主机名或 IP 地址、 端口号和传输协议建立的权限。A permission can be established for a host name or IP address, a port number, and a transport protocol. > [!NOTE] > 避免创建使用主机名，因为这些名称必须解析为 IP 地址，这可能会阻止在堆栈的套接字权限。Avoid creating socket permissions using host names, as these names have to be resolved to IP addresses, and this might block the stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类，以设置、 更改和强制实施各种套接字访问限制。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to set, change, and enforce various socket access restrictions. [!code-cpp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that allows unrestricted access to the or disallows access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用创建实例`Unrestricted`值从则实例允许所有请求。If the instance is created with the `Unrestricted` value from then the instance passes all demands. 任何其他值`state`会导致实例的所有请求都失败，除非传输地址权限会添加与。Any other value for `state` results in a instance that fails all demands unless a transport address permission is added with . ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用枚举值。The following example creates a using a enumerated value. summary.span: 用指定的权限初始化给定传输地址的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the given transport address with the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建控制对指定访问`hostName`并`portNumber`使用指定`transport`。This constructor creates a that controls access to the specified `hostName` and `portNumber` using the specified `transport`. `hostName`可以是 DNS 名称、 IP 地址或指定的 IP 子网，例如 192.168.1.\*。The `hostName` can be a DNS name, an IP address, or a specified IP subnet, such as 192.168.1.\*. `portNumber`可以是定义的传输方式，任何有效的端口号或。The `portNumber` can be any valid port number defined by the transport, or . ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用枚举值，枚举值，将主机名和端口号。The following example creates a using a enumerated value, a enumerated value, the hostname, and the port number. returns.span: 如果 参数为空引用，则该方法返回 。

span.span: If the parameter is a null reference, the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是可帮助保护的资源和操作受这两个权限的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that helps to protect the resources and operations protected by both permissions. 具体而言，它表示的最小权限，这样的任何请求都会通过这两个权限还通过它们的交集。Specifically, it represents the minimum permission such that any demand that passes both permissions also passes their intersection. 此方法重写并实现以支持接口。This method overrides and is implemented to support the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来获取两个逻辑交集实例。The following example uses the method to obtain a logical intersection between two instances. span.span: Determines if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果 为 ，而且当前实例没有定义权限，则此方法返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the current instance defines no permissions; otherwise, .

span.span: If is not , this method returns if the current instance defines a subset of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 192.168.1.1:80 访问权限的权限是对 192.168.1.1: any 表示访问权限的子集。For example, a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:80 is a subset of a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:Any. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以确定一个是另一个的子集。The following example uses the method to determine if one is the subset of another. [!code-cpp[SocketPermissionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SocketPermissionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SocketPermissionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/VB/source.vb#2)]
